programme.desc: Australia v England. Coverage of the fourth day of the First Test in the five-match series, which takes place at Optus Stadium in Perth. programme.title: Live: Football Night in America
programme.desc: "Football Night in America" features host Maria Taylor, Hall of Fame head coach Tony Dungy, former NFL head coach and quarterback Jason Garrett, former NFL quarterback Chris Simms and NFL insider Mike Florio recapping the day's NFL highlights. Co-host Jac Collinsworth and two-time Super Bowl champion Rodney Harrison contribute on-site each week.

programme.desc: The Buccaneers face the Rams in a key NFC outing. Los Angeles has won five in a row and leads the NFC West outright after slipping past Seattle 21-19 on Nov. 16. Entering Week 12, Matthew Stafford (LAR) led the NFL with 27 passing touchdowns.

programme.title: 30 for 30

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A famous TV host (Roger Bart) forces himself on the young author (Anna Chlumsky) of an erotic novel; Detective Amaro uncovers a secret that could damage the author's career and her case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a rape victim is arrested for murder in Suffolk County, Detective Benson questions the case and finds enough evidence for District Attorney Barba to charge a different suspect in Manhattan.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Investigation into the suspected rape of a woman Benson helped earlier leads to a cybermogul; the team bids farewell to Sgt. Munch.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: ADA Barba finds that a friend (Kirk Acevedo) -- with a connection to a mayoral candidate frontrunner -- is accused of rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a woman is followed home and raped outside of her building, neighbors witness the crime but neglect to call for help.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a young woman is raped by a member of her church group, Barba argues that the First Amendment doesn't entitle a person to break the law.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a masked pizza deliveryman assaults a seemingly random couple in their home, SVU must unravel a complicated revenge plot before anyone else is victimized.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives learn that the pregnant daughter-in-law of a prominent religious educator may have been having an affair at the time of her murder.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The trial of an accused child molester is jeopardized when the prime witness has difficulty dealing with his past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The shooting death of a school student by a 7-year-old classmate leads to new information on an unsolved slaying.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A standoff in a motel on the Jersey Shore incites a pedophile to take detective Benson hostage.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young boy is found alone in Central Park, the search for his parents leads to evidence of a planned mass-casualty event in the city; the SVU works with the joint-terrorism task force to identify the suspects and the motive.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: One day after a convicted rapist is exonerated by DNA evidence, a shocking new crime forces Fin and the team to search for the whereabouts of the man again.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a man uses a false identity to lure a vulnerable married woman to bed, Barba thinks the evidence amounts to rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A sexually assaulted athlete's secret double life could destroy her Olympic career and ruin the case against her attacker; Rollins' sister is released from prison on parole.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives interrogate the CEO of a recording company and his protg for their involvement in an assault on a transgender student.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A woman who is sexually assaulted by a masked man believes her attacker is the same man who was jailed for stalking her; Tucker thinks about retirement and a future with Benson.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The case of a 6-year-old boy who disappeared from his bed in the midst of his mother's wild, drug-fueled party causes Benson to think about her own role as a mother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The powerful family behind a retail empire defends one of its own from a bartender's rape accusation.

programme.desc: Benson and the team work to uncover a pregnant teenager's secret when she refuses to name the baby's father.

programme.desc: Benson and the SVU team help a teenage exchange student from Italy after she's assaulted by a cab driver.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A crime scene poses a security risk when the team discovers the location was used to create a deadly toxin that is now missing.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU investigates the sexual assault of a 15-year-old boy, but when he won't cooperate, they must find another way to uncover his perpetrator; Rollins reconnects with her ex, and Benson worries she isn't the Wonder Woman she used to be.

programme.desc: SVU investigates the sexual assault of a 15-year-old boy, but when he won't cooperate, they must find another way to uncover his perpetrator; Rollins reconnects with her ex; Benson worries she isn't the Wonder Woman she used to be.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl taken from her mother at the U.S.-Mexico border ends up in a sex-trafficking ring in New York, and Benson and Stone fight to reunite the girl with her mother; Rollins confesses to her ex.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: SVU must unravel the mystery of a sexually assaulted young homeless woman who has a dual personality; when she goes missing after being assaulted, the team is challenged to uncover not only her identity but also her whereabouts.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.desc: Stone asks Benson to investigate a sexual encounter from his past that he feels guilt and uncertainty about; Rollins considers a proposal from Doctor Al.

programme.desc: A serial rapist strikes again after two decades of silence, and SVU is determined to uncover the elusive criminal and bring justice to his many victims; Stone discovers that his father worked on the case before it went cold.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU pursues a suspect when a child is discovered in the trunk of an abandoned car.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
